template.name: Template OS Windows Database checks
template.description:
Template for Windows hosts, checks and triggers for monitoring using remote Zabbix agent and WMI
Eugene Bobkov 12/2018

item.name: CPU count
item.description: CPU count, number of virtual/logical CPUs

item.name: Operating System data (json)
item.description: Operating system information: Boot time OS Version OS Service Pack version

item.name: Memory usage (%)
item.description: Percentage of used physical memory space

item.name: Filesystem C:\ free space (bytes)
item.description: OS file system monitoring, C drive is filtered out from discovery results for file systems.

item.name: Filesystem C:\ total size (bytes)
item.description: OS file system monitoring, C drive is filtered out from discovery results for file systems.

item.name: Filesystem C:\ used space (bytes)
item.description: OS file system monitoring, C drive is filtered out from discovery results for file systems.

item.name: Filesystem C:\ used space (%)
item.description: OS file system monitoring, C drive is filtered out from discovery results for file systems.

trigger.name: Space usage exceeded {$C_DRIVE_HIGH} % for C:\ filesystem
Space usage exceeded {$C_DRIVE_WARNING} % for C:\ filesystem

dependency.name: Space usage exceeded {$C_DRIVE_HIGH} % for C:\ filesystem
